attributes.action: Ask travel companies agree to stop raising prices for holidays during school breaks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask travel companies to stop charging so much more for holidays during school breask, thereby forcing parents to choose between a reasonably priced break and removing their kids from school during term time, and risking fines etc

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists, you may wish to add your support to: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/termtime/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
